title: // & // there will be an extra monthly fee @ (check it out online).
posting_body: 3 Bedroom Upstairs apt rear building on Route 7 next door the new school bus Garage.
You will need to prove how you are able pay the rent, HUD may be accepted.
You will need an $1055 security deposit & some references that you don't trash my place.
You may also be required to to apply through Tubotennat which cost $25.00, (check it out online).
If you are not prepared to go through a background check please don't waste our time.
However definitely check you want it before investing in the background check.
I prefer no pets, if you do need a dog, it may not be one on the prohibited list.
& there will be an extra monthly fee.
